text: Allahanu isra'ilara santatigalinda kararannu padediddanu. Navu (allah) avara paiki 12 mandiyannu netararagi nemisiddevu. Avarodane allahanu helidanu: Nanu nim'ma jotegiddene. Nivu namajhâ€Œna palane maduttaliddare, jhakat annu pavatisuttaliddare, nanna dutaralli nambike irisi, avarige neravaguttaliddare mattu nivu allahanige olitina salavannu niduttaliddare nanu khandita nim'minda nim'ma papagalannu nivarisuvenu mattu nim'mannu, taladalli nadigalu hariyuttiruva svargodyanagalolage serisuvenu. Innu idada balika nim'ma paiki dhikkariyadavanu khanditavagiyu sanmargavannu kaledukondanu â€“ (endu avarige tilisalagittu)
